Class TileMap

It's a class that renders a tile map

  • Method Details

    • loadTileMap

      public static TileMap loadTileMap(Color[][] colors, TileMap tileMap, TileSet tileSet, Vector2 grid, Entity entity, YldB concurrent)
      It loads a tile map from a 2D array of colors
      Parameters:
      colors - The colors of the tiles in the tilemap.
      tileMap - The tilemap you want to load the tiles into.
      tileSet - The tileset to use
      grid - The size of the tiles.
      entity - The entity that the tilemap will be attached to.
      concurrent - The YldB instance that contains concurrent information.
      Returns:
      A TileMap

    • loadTileMap

      public static TileMap loadTileMap(Color[][] colors, TileMap tileMap, TileSet tileSet)
      Loads a tile map from a 2D array of colors.
      Parameters:
      colors - The 2D array of colors that you want to load into the tile map.
      tileMap - The tile map to load the colors into.
      tileSet - The TileSet to use for the TileMap.
      Returns:
      A TileMap object.

    • loadTileMap

      public static TileMap loadTileMap(Color[][] colors, TileMap tileMap, TileSet tileSet, Entity entity)
      It takes a 2D array of colors
      Parameters:
      colors - The 2D array of colors that you want to load.
      tileMap - The tilemap to load the colors into.
      tileSet - The TileSet to use for the TileMap.
      entity - The entity that the tilemap will be attached to.
      Returns:
      A TileMap object.

    • getTiles

      public List<YldPair<Vector2,YldPair<Tile,Boolean>>> getTiles()
      This function returns a list of pairs of Vector2s and pairs of Tiles and Booleans.
      Returns:
      A list of YldPairs of Vector2 and YldPairs of Tile and Boolean.

    • setTiles

      public void setTiles(List<YldPair<Vector2,YldPair<Tile,Boolean>>> tiles)
      This function sets the tiles of the map.
      Parameters:
      tiles - A list of YldPairs. The first element of the YldPair is a Vector2, which is the position of the tile. The second element of the YldPair is another YldPair, which contains the Tile object and a boolean.

      Parameters:
